SELECT ROUT_ID , ROUT_NM , SHORT_ROUT_NM , WAY_INFO , DIR_INFO , WAY_DIV , CD.DL_CD_NM AS WAY_DIV_NM
, CD2.DL_CD_NM AS USER_WAY_DIV , TURN_DIV , CD3.DL_CD_NM AS TURN_DIV_NM , ST_STA_NM , ED_STA_NM , DVC_NAME , LINE1_STR , LINE2_STR , LINE1_SATSTR , LINE2_SATSTR , LINE1_SUNSTR , LINE2_SUNSTR , DATE_FORMAT(ROUT.CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_AT , ROUT.CREATED_BY , DATE_FORMAT(ROUT.UPDATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS UPDATED_AT , ROUT.UPDATED_BY
FROM BM_ROUT_INFO ROUT LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG') CD ON ROUT.WAY_DIV = CD.NUM_VAL4
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG') CD2 ON ROUT.USER_WAY_DIV = CD2.NUM_VAL4
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'WAYDIV_FLAG') CD3 ON ROUT.TURN_DIV = CD3.TXT_VAL1
ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')

SELECT NI.STA_ID , SI.STA_NM , SI.STA_NO , SI.LATI , SI.LONGI , SI.UPDATED_AT FROM BM_ROUT_NODE_INFO NI LEFT JOIN BM_STA_INFO SI ON NI.STA_ID = SI.STA_ID WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId} AND NI.STA_ID IS NOT NULL
AND( NI.STA_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter1}, '%') OR SI.STA_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter1}, '%') OR SI.STA_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter1}, '%') )
ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT DL_CD_NM AS NAME , CAST(NUM_VAL4 AS INTEGER) AS CODE FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG'
